title: Add LLM Reasoning Enrichment to Recommend Agent
description:
Implement hybrid LLM approach for RecommendAgent - keep rule-based decisions, add LLM-generated reasoning.

## Plan
See: ~/.claude/plans/shimmying-pondering-riddle.md

## Key Components
1. `backend/helpers/llm_client.py` - Gemini API client
2. `backend/helpers/reasoning_enricher.py` - LLM enrichment with hallucination prevention
3. Modify `recommend_agent.py` - Add async method with LLM integration

## Hallucination Prevention (4 Layers)
1. Prompt constraints (only use provided data)
2. Pydantic validation (banned phrases)
3. Number fact-checking (verify against grounding)
4. Action immutability (LLM cannot change decisions)

## Fallback Logging
All fallback scenarios logged with reason:
- API error
- Timeout
- Hallucination detected
- Validation failure
